author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Gets indicators from AutoFocus.
commands.name: autofocus-daily-get-indicators

integration.description: Use the AutoFocus Daily feed to export threat intelligence data produced by AutoFocus and connected services to provide actionable data for the Palo Alto Networks firewall as well as third party TIP and SIEM solutions. AutoFocus feed return a list which includes IP addresses, domains, URLs, and hash indicators which are updated daily.
integration.name: AutoFocus Daily Feed

commands.description: Gets the indicators from AutoFocus.
commands.name: autofocus-get-indicators

integration.description: Use the AutoFocus Feeds integration to fetch indicators from AutoFocus.
integration.name: AutoFocus Feed

commands.description: Searches for samples in AutoFocus. To view results, run the autofocus-samples-search-results command with the returned AF Cookie. The AF Cookie expires 120 seconds after the search completes. `Autofocus Query Samples, Sessions and Tags` Playbook is recommended for querying and polling.
commands.name: autofocus-search-samples

commands.description: Searches for sessions in AutoFocus. To view results, run the autofocus-sessions-search-results command with the returned AF Cookie. The AF Cookie expires 120 seconds after the search completes. `Autofocus Query Samples, Sessions and Tags` Playbook is recommended for querying and polling.
commands.name: autofocus-search-sessions

commands.description: Returns results of a previous samples search. `Autofocus Query Samples, Sessions and Tags` Playbook is recommended for querying and polling.
commands.name: autofocus-samples-search-results

commands.description: Returns results of a previous sessions search. `Autofocus Query Samples, Sessions and Tags` Playbook is recommended for querying and polling.
commands.name: autofocus-sessions-search-results

commands.description: Get session details by session ID
commands.name: autofocus-get-session-details

commands.description: Returns properties, behaviors, and activities observed for a sample. Run the command a single time to get the fields and operating systems under HTTP, Coverage, Behavior, Registry, Files, Processes, Connections, and DNS.
commands.name: autofocus-sample-analysis

commands.description: Returns details about the given tag.
commands.name: autofocus-tag-details

commands.description: Performs a search to identify the most popular tags. `Autofocus Query Samples, Sessions and Tags` Playbook is recommended for querying and polling.
commands.name: autofocus-top-tags-search

commands.description: Returns the results of a previous top tags search. `Autofocus Query Samples, Sessions and Tags` Playbook is recommended for querying and polling.
commands.name: autofocus-top-tags-results

playbook.description:
Use this playbook as a sub-playbook to  query PANW Autofocus Threat intelligence system. This sub-playbook is the same as the generic polling sub-playbook besides that it provides outputs in the playbook. The reason for that is that in Autofocus its impossible to query the results of the same query more than once so the outputs have to be in the polling context.

This playbook implements polling by continuously running the command in Step \#2 until the operation completes.
The remote action should have the following structure:

1. Initiate the operation.
2. Poll to check if the operation completed.
3. (optional) Get the results of the operation.
playbook.name: AutoFocusPolling

playbook.description:
This playbook is used for querying the PANW threat intelligence Autofocus system. The playbook accepts indicators such as IP's, hashes, domains to run basic queries or mode advanced queries that can leverage several query parameters. In order to run the more advanced queries its recommended to use the Autofocus UI https://autofocus.paloaltonetworks.com/#/dashboard/organization to created a query and than use the export search button. The result can be used as a playbook input.

The playbook supports searching both the Samples API and the sessions API.
playbook.name: Autofocus Query Samples, Sessions and Tags

description:
Use the Palo Alto Networks AutoFocus integration to distinguish the most
  important threats from everyday commodity attacks.
name: AutoFocus
